pageTitle: 20" Hokki Stool by VS America Inc
textBeforeTable: We add a surcharge for expedited delivery of a few items because of their weight, size or dimensions. This charge is in addition to our base shipping charge for Next Day or Second Day Air. Express Delivery Surcharge Read our Insights and Inspirations article How to Use Hokki Stools in Your Classroom for some fun ways you can use Hokki Stools to create an engaging learning environment. Want more information on how Hokki Stools can have a positive impact in your classroom? A safe seating alternative for children with certain disabilities Encourages stationary sitting for children with the "wiggles" Stackable to save space Lightweight and portable Comfortable and sturdy Ergonomic design Features: Adult. The 20" HOKKI is an ergonomic stool that transforms stationary sitting into an activity, ideal for brainstorming sessions and other active sitting environments. You're moving, even when you seem to be sitting still. The convex base allows for movement in all directions, which is critical to student development as physical movement both increases well-being and encourages the physical and intellectual maturing process. The polypropylene body is highly stable and durable, but at the same time extremely light. The soft base padding prevents slipping. The foam sitting surface ensures increased safety for children while seated. HOKKI - for active sitting About
